text: Today, we discussed w/ Commissioners the Action Plan to Fight #Cancer. @EU_H2020's Cancer Mission will play a key role and we also aim to integrate @EU_ScienceHub,@EITeu, @MSCActions, @EUErasmusPlus as well as #youth & #sport policies in the fight to improve lives of 🇪🇺 citizens. https://t.co/f4vVzYmXzD
